content: a friend of mine a breast cancer survivor commented i ve only ever seen two pink ribbon type projects that i liked and they were both yours yours aren t cloying i appreciated the comment and in honor of breast cancer awareness month here s my pink ribbon tote as a free pattern it s done in tunisian crochet on a large hook with a handle done in wide double i-cord don t be scared by the crochet thing - this is dead easy it s also fast fast fast the other pattern a scarf will be available here as soon as i have time there are tutorials for tunisian crochet widely available online check out stitch diva 1 and nexstitch 2 the pattern takes 4 skeins each a different color of lamb s pride bulky or worsted 1 http //stitchdiva com 2 http //nexstitch com
